CallZText:
ВІДСУТНЄ ГВП З 29  ЛИПНЯ 2013Р. ВОДА ВІДСУТНЯ ПРОТЯГОМ 74 ДНІВ. ЗВЕРНЕННЯ МОВОЮ ОРИГІНАЛУ:      HOT WATER WAS CUT ON JULY 29.
THERE HAS BEEN NO HOT WATER FOR 74 DAYS.
THERE IS NO HEATING.
WE PAY ZHEK EVERY MONTH, ON TIME, SINCE YEAR 2003, SINCE WE STARTED LIVING HERE.
WE CALLED ZHEK:
”YOU WILL HAVE HOT WATER ON SEPTEMBER 19”. NO HOT WATER. CALLED AGAIN:
”YOU WILL HAVE HOT WATER ON OCTOBER FIRST”. NO HOT WATER. CALLED AGAIN:
”YOU WILL HAVE HOT WATER ON OCTOBER 11”. NO HOT WATER. CALLED AGAIN:
”YOU WILL HAVE HOT WATER WHEN YOU WILL HAVE HOT WATER. NO DATE...”

74 DAYS WITHOUT HOT WATER. NOW, WE WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF SOMEONE, SOMEWHERE, KNOWS THE ANSWER TO A SIMPLE QUESTION:
”WHEN WILL WE HAVE HOT WATER”?
THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR UNDERSTANDING.
FRANCOIS DEMERS
